definitions.definition: A dishonest person; a rogue , a scoundrel , a trickster .
Sometimes diminutive : a cheeky person or creature; a troublemaker .
examples: If you have deer in the area, you may have to put a fence around your garden to keep the rascals out.

definitions.definition: A member of a criminal gang .

main_definition: A dishonest person; a rogue , a scoundrel , a trickster .
secondary_definitions: Sometimes diminutive : a cheeky person or creature; a troublemaker .
( Papua New Guinea ) A member of a criminal gang .
